title: Travis Mullen | Software Engineer.
info:
I'm a full stack software engineer.

My focus is building progressive web applications (PWAs) and decentralized applications (DApps). I love Vue.js and hope to never use Angular again. My platform of choice is Ethereum, but if you ask nicely I can deploy projects onto a centralized server.
I also develop tools to manage and automate nodes on various blockchain platforms, and write smart contracts using solidity. I can talk about cryptocurrency and brewing beer for hours at a time.
I almost forget to mention Bitcoin.
keywords: software engineer, javascript, nodejs, blockchain, dapps, pwa, web applications, es6, ethereum, smart contracts
description: Developer of web applications using modern JavaScript and smart contracts using Solidity.
